description: Welcome to Heywood Lane! A professionally managed 18 unit strata located in the heart of Mosquito Creek. This south-facing 3 bed, 3 bath + den townhome offers a great layout & a 330sqft sunny patio just off the living & dining, perfect for entertaining. The main level features a spacious living room w/ a cozy fireplace & bay window. Upstairs delivers the ideal family layout with all three bedrooms on one level, a primary bedroom that easily fits a king-size bed, complete with a walk-in closet & ensuite. Downstairs provides functionality with tons of storage, mudroom with dedicated laundry room, a versatile den/office, & direct access to your side-by-side 2 parking stalls. A walkable lifestyle, steps to Cap Mall, Heywood Park, & close to Westview Elementary and Carson Graham Secondary.
